ygData.subject: Re: Shadow Knights?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well i am pretty sure im kos any where that drops decent loot so i can wait. I made 25 and didnt feel like going back to the treans, so i am soloing ec guards.
ygData.messageBody:
Well i am pretty sure im kos any where that drops
decent loot so i can wait. I made 25 and didnt feel like
going back to the treans, so i am soloing ec guards.
They have pretty good exp(especially for a troll SK,
bout 1/5 bub a kill)and they drop, pretty good
loot(3-5pp most of the time + FS weapons, have had the
occasional few silver but i also had a treant drop 13 copper
once so i guess nohing is consistant). <br><br>Thx for
the help, <br>Cireno De'Tenebrae<br>House
Kenafin<br>Brell
